oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Snow Benefit at the Grand Ole Opry - 1978-08-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Hank Snow Benefit Concert at the Grand Ole Opry. The segment is hosted by T. Tommy Cutrer (musician) and features performances by: Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers (musical group), Ernest Tubb (musician) and the Four Guys (musicial group). The recording is from August 31, 1978. The tape is part two of four.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers; Four Guys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Tubb expresses his thanks to the program and introduces his band -- (02:23) Half a Mind (Ernest Tubb) -- (04:45) In the Jailhouse Now (Ernest Tubb) -- (06:53) Tubb praises Jimmie Rodgers -- (07:13) Waltz Across Texas (Ernest Tubb) -- (10:27) Mind Your Own Business (Rusty Adams) -- (12:30) Tubb praises Adams -- (13:10) Dear Judge (Ernest Tubb) -- (16:10) Tubb recalls playing "Walking the Floor Over You" at the Grand Ole Opry -- (16:51) Walking the Floor Over You (Ernest Tubb) -- (18:55) Unidentified tune (Tennessee Travelers) -- (19:15) T. Tommy Cutrer reflects on the Today Show interview with Hank Snow and introduces Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers -- (20:26) Unidentified tune (Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers) -- (23:12) Cutrer introduces the break ahead of incoherent chatter; additionally, Cutrer expresses his thanks to the various support the show received -- (29:17) Unidentified tune (Ralph Sloan and the Tennessee Travelers) -- (32:48) Cutrer jokes about dancing and reflects on Sloan's success in Nashville -- (34:05) (Your Love Keeps Lifting Me) Higher and Higher (The Four Guys) -- (38:50) Don't Let Go (The Four Guys) -- (42:24) An unidentified member of the Fabulous Four Guys describes the process of deciding "Ladies and Gentlemen, Hello" as their opening tune -- (43:25) Ladies and Gentlemen, Hello (The Four Guys) -- (45:45) Searchin' (The Four Guys) -- (49:21) The Four Guys thank the accompanying band -- (50:01) Hangin' on (The Four Guys) -- (55:08) Unidentified tune (The Four Guys)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Four Guys (Musical group); Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Tubb, Ernest; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984;
